message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I'm asking for $22,000 to start. I know it's valuable and believe it will be a great investment for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. Let's find a middle ground - how about $19,000?  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.

I understand that you think the product is valuable, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14,500? I'm willing to make a serious commitment, but I need to stay within my budget.
